content:
I tried to create a DSTU2 IG using the latest build and package and got this:

    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.SpecificationPackage.fromPackage(SpecificationPackage.java:45)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.loadPack(Publisher.java:1295)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.loadCorePackage(Publisher.java:1273)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.initialize(Publisher.java:989)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.execute(Publisher.java:461)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.main(Publisher.java:4547)
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.main(Publisher.java:4557)
pub3.sh: line 53: p[[ ]]: command not found
Erics-Air-2:smart-app-launch-dstu2 ehaas$

~~~~
Is this a package issue or me? BTW @Grahame Grieve I will need npm names for Smart launch . I was just trying to the DSTU2 profile for the extensions so no need for name for that only STU3
commited a fix. you'll always need NPM names

still getting this error. I deleted the prior package too.

no changes added to commit (use "git add" and/or "git commit -a")
